channel.title: How to add Donator-Points (pi)
channel.description:
[center][size=14pt]First Go Into Player.java-----Src----Server----Model-----Players[/size][/center]
Add Probably under Pcpoints or pk points
[code]donPoints,[/code]
[center][size=14pt]Next Go into Playersave.java-----Src----Server----Model-----Players[/size][/center]
Add
[code]} else if (token.equals("don-points")) { p.donPoints = Integer.parseInt(token2);[/code]
Then add [code]characterfile.write("don-points = ", 0, 13); characterfile.write(Integer.toString(p.donPoints), 0, Integer .toString(p.donPoints).length()); characterfile.newLine();[/code]
Please Post Any Errors
Rep :)

item.title: How to add Donator-Points (pi)
item.dc:creator: @fasthop10 fasthop10
item.description:
@fasthop10 wrote:

[quote=“11j123, post:14, topic:416087”][quote author=Fridder link=topic=518026.msg3764701#msg3764701 date=1317153118]

dude pi is a 317 version its not hard to convert pi to 317…

what PI mean OMG !O.o

PI is about 95% of the ‘317’ servers on any toplist (you know which one I really mean) or server status page or most ‘640’ servers. They’re just PI servers with 640 content dumped into them.

PI is Project Insanity. You know all those servers in the download section that have the same gameframe? Those are probably PI.
Examples of Project Insanity servers:
My Last Project Insanity
InsidniaX
Spectral’s World
Uncalled Attack v4
Jinsanity
A PI server with a weird name by Kaex
Project Reality

I think you get the point.

PI was made by Sanity some time in April 2010, I might be wrong.
People use it because it’s easy to understand, easy to code, and players like it. People here at mopar who are working on projects that are not Project Insanity based probably hate PI because of it’s memory leaks and whatnot.
[/quote]
That deserves some rep fridder but the two problems are you got max rep and I can’t rep lol :D[/quote]

lol i can and will for the hell of it.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

[quote=“dragon f b94, post:6, topic:416087”][quote author=fasthop10 link=topic=518026.msg3764439#msg3764439 date=1317129707]
dude pi is a 317 version its not hard to convert pi to 317…
[/quote]

what PI mean OMG !O.o[/quote]

PI is about 95% of the ‘317’ servers on any toplist (you know which one I really mean) or server status page or most ‘640’ servers. They’re just PI servers with 640 content dumped into them.

PI is Project Insanity. You know all those servers in the download section that have the same gameframe? Those are probably PI.
Examples of Project Insanity servers:
My Last Project Insanity
InsidniaX
Spectral’s World
Uncalled Attack v4
Jinsanity
A PI server with a weird name by Kaex
Project Reality

I think you get the point.

PI was made by Sanity some time in April 2010, I might be wrong.
People use it because it’s easy to understand, easy to code, and players like it. People here at mopar who are working on projects that are not Project Insanity based probably hate PI because of it’s memory leaks and whatnot.
